title: Bloody Monday: Week 4 injury updates ... and they aren't pretty
text: Gigi Hadid Defends Her Figure on Instagram... 00:56 Gigi Hadid is more than just a pretty face. Ahead of Paris Fashion Week, the 20-year-old supermodel took to Instagram Monday to defend herself against people who have body-shamed her online. Hadid wrote on Instagram, "So many people are so quick to comment negative opinions this month. Yes, judgment... Other recent news in U.S. Sports: NFL
